translation.fr: Tu t'adresses au seigneur aquatique du…

translation.en: -What? -Oh, look at his face.
-Low humidity. Arid climate. -[villagers] Ew!
Don't look at me! No, no, no. Be right back.
[Dragon King] So invigorating.
-…undersea ruler of the dragon kingdom. -What? Come on.
translation.fr: … au seigneur aquatique du royaume dragon.

translation.en: And you, sir, stole my stick.
translation.fr: À qui tu as dérobé son bâton.

translation.en: No, I didn't. I found it at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.fr: Non, je l'ai trouvé au fond de l'océan.

translation.en: Right in the middle of some tacky palace.
Tacky? Once I reclaim my stick,
translation.fr: Kitsch ? Quand j'aurai récupéré mon bâton,

translation.en: you and all these air-breathers will suffer my… my…
translation.fr: mon courroux s'abattra sur toi et…

translation.en: Again?
Arid climate. No. Look away!
…suffer my wrath!
There's supposed to be a lightning crash.
And there it is. [laughs]
Hey, Babbo, how will we know when we're under the stick?
translation.fr: Babbo, comment on sait où se trouve bâton ?

translation.en: Easy. The stick will be right above us.
How will we know we took the right stick?
translation.fr: Mais si c'est pas le bon ?

translation.en: [scoffs] There's only one choice.
But what if we choose wrong, Babbo?
translation.fr: Mais si on se trompe quand même ?

translation.en: Look at that armor.
Who even wears brass with gold?
Look, buddy, I hear ya. You love my stick. Everyone loves the stick.
translation.fr: J'ai bien compris. Tu en as après mon bâton, comme les autres.

translation.en: But no one appreciates the stick like I do.
translation.fr: Mais personne ne l'aime comme moi.

translation.en: -[Stick murmurs urgently] -Quiet! The grown-ups are talking.
And now you're ruining my exclusive ceremony.
translation.fr: En plus, tu gâches ma cérémonie.

translation.en: Point is, Stick is not going anywhere.
translation.fr: Alors soyons clairs, Bâton reste avec moi.

translation.en: -Ain't that right, Stick? Buddy? -[henchman 2] Ow!
-Uh-oh. -Hey, are they with--
-[dramatic music plays] -Stick, stay strong! I'm coming!
[Monkey King] Hang on, Stick!
Babbo, I'm gonna get sick!
Stick, left!
And to the right!
Ha ha! You missed!
Stick, darling, it's Dragon.
-He's mine! -Jump in the tub!
He only listens to me, flaky.
I don't see a ring on it, honey! [grunts]
Itching! Flaking!
Of course! An avalanche.
-Hit the brake! -[Monkey King] Fun ride, huh?
-[henchmen groan] -[Monkey King] See ya!
-[henchman 2] Babbo! -[Babbo] Curse you, gravity!
Ha ha! Monkey King reigns supreme!
translation.fr: Le Roi singe règne en maître !

translation.en: [Dragon King] Stick!
Catch me!
My palace is not tacky!
[Lin panting] Gotcha!
Dragon King?
Fear not, little girl. The villain is gone.
translation.fr: Rassure-toi, petite. Le méchant est parti.

translation.en: Maybe you're not as useless as I thought.
-So, do I have the job? -Um…
Nope.
[Lin] Oh, come on.
Twenty minutes, and still no invite from the Jade Emperor. -What am I missing? -[murmurs]
translation.fr: Ça fait 20 minutes, et toujours rien. J'ai raté un truc ?

translation.en: Immortality! Of course. It's right in the name.
To become an Immortal One, I need immortality!
[Lin] Maybe I can help.
Okay, look, kid. You see this?
Your palm?
No! I mean, yes. But no. This here is me.
translation.fr: Non ! Enfin, si. Mais non. - Cette paume, c'est moi. - OK…

translation.en: Okay?
And this tiny thing is you.
translation.fr: Et ce petit truc, c'est toi.

translation.en: -Get it now? -Huh?
[Monkey King] I'm the universe hand, and you're an insignificant, useless pebble.
translation.fr: Tu n'es qu'un tout petit caillou dans l'univers qu'est ma main.

translation.en: Even a tiny pebble can make a big ripple, you know.
translation.fr: Un petit caillou peut être un atout.

translation.en: [scoffs] That's just what a tiny pebble would say.
So, Stick, immortality, where do we go?
Really? Huh.
-But how do we get there? -[Stick hums]
A graveyard? Spooky.
Grave… Gra…
-Graveyard. -You can't read.
Of course I can.
That's grass. That's the sky. That's a rock. See? Reading.
translation.fr: L'herbe. Le ciel. Un rocher. Je sais lire.

translation.en: -Graveyard's that way. -Obviously.
-[Stick hums] -No, no, no, no, no. We don't need her.
translation.fr: Non, on n'a pas besoin d'elle.

translation.en: -He wants me to come. Doesn't he? -Just go home, kid.
translation.fr: - Il est pas d'accord. - Rentre chez toi.

translation.en: I can't go home. There's trouble back there, and it made me do some things.
translation.fr: Impossible. Les conditions difficiles m'ont forcée

translation.en: -Things I probably shouldn't have done. -Ooh! You killed someone?
translation.fr: à faire certaines choses. - À tuer ? - Non !

translation.en: I just wanna do big things someday. Like you.
translation.fr: J'ai des rêves de grandeur, comme vous.

translation.en: -I know. No. I-- -[Stick murmurs] -Yes, but-- -[Stick murmurs]
translation.fr: Je sais bien. Non. Oui, mais…

translation.en: How much reading could we possibly need?
-[Stick murmurs] -Fine. I said fine! [sighs]
So, assistant girl, you coming or what?
[Lin] So, where to next?
In there? Us? How?
This. It's like an all-access VIP pass.
translation.fr: Grâce à ça. Notre pass VIP interdimensions, inter-royaumes, les Enfers inclus.

translation.en: Any realm, any dimension. Even the Land of the Dead.
translation.fr: Notre pass VIP interdimensions, inter-royaumes, les Enfers inclus.

translation.en: But you're not dead.
And if all goes well, never will be.
Okay. If we're gonna fit in, we gotta dress the part.
translation.fr: Bon, il va falloir se mêler à la foule.

translation.en: [coughs] What the heck? [Monkey King] Not heck.
Hell.
Try to keep up.
Are we even supposed to be here?
translation.fr: On a le droit d'être ici ?

translation.en: Absolutely not. Isn't it great?
See, the day you're supposed to die
translation.fr: Le jour de ta mort est inscrit

translation.en: is recorded in the Scroll of Life and Death.
translation.fr: dans le Parchemin de la Vie et de la Mort.

translation.en: But if my name should somehow get crossed out,
translation.fr: Donc si je raye mon nom,

translation.en: then no death registered, and guess who's immortal?
Me! [laughs]
One more thing. Die in hell, stay in hell. So don't die.
translation.fr: Au fait, si tu meurs en enfer, tu y restes. Alors, évite.

translation.en: This is a bad idea.
[demon] Next.
Act like a ghost.
Oh yeah. Great. You're giving me chills.
translation.fr: Super, j'en ai la chair de poule.

translation.en: King here! Coming through!
Make way.
Next! Release form. [groans]
You brought a live chicken to the underworld?
No living things allowed!
We really should go now.
[scoffs] Watch and learn, Pebble.
That's better. Pit of Infinite Agony. Fourth floor on your right. Next!
translation.fr: Je préfère. Puits de l'Agonie infinie, 4e étage à droite. Suivant !

translation.en: Yes, good morning.
I'd like a quick glance at the Life and Death Scrolls.
Release form first.
It's in my other armor?
Rejected! [growls]
-Release form. -Back to the world of the living.
Not so fast.
-As my assistant, your first duty… -[Lin groans]
…is to be the sacrificial lamb.
translation.fr: - de se sacrifier pour moi. - Arrêtez !

translation.en: -What are you doing? -She's alive? Here in hell? -What? -You're alive!
How scandalous!
And you cut in front of all these people?
translation.fr: En plus, tu coupes la queue ?

translation.en: -What? -No living things allowed!
-Oh, Monkey! -[Monkey cackles] Uh, uh, I… I'm not…
translation.fr: Singe ! Non, non, je suis pas…

translation.en: I couldn't be more dead. Fresh corpse here.
How did you die?
Old age. No, I mean scurvy. Earthquake?
translation.fr: De vieillesse. Non, du scorbut. D'un séisme ?

translation.en: A duel. Two duels.
Here's the story.
I fell… off a cliff into a hole filled with sharks.
translation.fr: Je suis tombée d'une falaise dans la gueule de requins.

translation.en: Rabid sharks.
And then a house fell on me, and I drowned. Yeah.
translation.fr: Une maison m'est tombée dessus, puis je me suis noyée.

translation.en: Okay, you're in.
Chamber of Ridiculous Deaths.
Fifth floor down the hall.
Next!
-[screams] -[ghost] What a guy.
Monkey! You abandoned me in the middle of hell.
translation.fr: Tu m'as abandonnée au milieu des Enfers.

translation.en: You don't leave a teammate behind.
What teammate? You're an assistant. An insignificant pebble.
translation.fr: Pas de ça entre nous, petit caillou de rien du tout.

translation.en: -Stop calling me that. -Absolutely.
translation.fr: - Arrête de dire ça. - Avec plaisir.

translation.en: As soon as you find my scroll so I can cross my name off. Come on.
translation.fr: Dès que tu auras trouvé mon parchemin.

translation.en: -[grunts] This shouldn't take long. -[Lin gasps]
[Lin] What?
Get reading.
What's your family name? Don't have one. I was born from a rock.
translation.fr: - Nom de famille ? - Aucun. Je suis sorti d'un rocher.

translation.en: A rock?
More of a rock egg. The scrolls list your family history.
translation.fr: D'un œuf-rocher. Le parchemin contient l'arbre généalogique.

translation.en: I must have parents, right?
translation.fr: Je dois bien avoir des parents.

translation.en: Well, I guess.
Everyone does.
Ha! Looking for your scrolls? [laughs]
My scroll? Why does he have my scroll?
translation.fr: Pourquoi il a le mien aussi ?

translation.en: You don't belong here, outsiders.
translation.fr: Vous n'avez pas votre place ici, Étrangers.

translation.en: Oh ho! Time to defeat demon 101.
translation.fr: Au tour du cent unième démon…

translation.en: [demon] Mighty brush! Stamp of doom!
translation.fr: Super pinceau ! Tampon de la mort !

translation.en: Open! Hyah!
-[clone 1] Don't let them get away! -[clone 2] Capture them!
[clone 3] Stop the monkey!
Through 115.
-Clones, eh? -[Stick murmurs]
I can? Really? Cool!
Monkey King reigns supreme!
translation.fr: Le Roi singe règne en maître !

translation.en: Bring it! [grunts]
Not the beard!
Next!
-Wait! Time-out. I'm not a part of this. -Nobody's on the bench!
translation.fr: - Temps mort. J'y suis pour rien. - Pas de dispense !

translation.en: -[demon] Get her! -[Monkey King] Duck!
Got 'em.
Monkey, I got 'em. This one's mine. Huh?
translation.fr: Je les ai ! Celui-là est à moi.

translation.en: Hey! Not yours!
What's it say about my family? [yells]
It says
you don't have one.
Oh. I'm all alone?
I'm sorry, Monkey. -Which means-- -[demon grunts]
Oof! I'm an original! One of a kind!
-Give me that scroll. -Third line from the bottom.
Step away from the scroll, you flea-bitten, mortal lowlife! Close!
translation.fr: N'y touche pas, sale mortel pouilleux !

translation.en: Come on!
Got it.
Monkey King!
Oh, her.
Ow! That hurt.
And now I'm immortal!
Even for hell, this is bad.
What's up, Yama? Or should I say, what's down? [laughs]
translation.fr: Ça va, Yama ? Au top ? Enfin, pas vraiment.

translation.en: I beseech you. A rogue primate has invaded hell and-- Ow!
translation.fr: Je vous implore. Un vaurien de primate s'est introduit…

translation.en: Hey, uh, Jade Emperor, right? Listen, great news.
translation.fr: Empereur de Jade, c'est ça ? Bonne nouvelle.

translation.en: Get the Immortal Ones together. I'm on my way. We're gonna be neighbors.
translation.fr: Réunis les Immortels, j'arrive. On va être voisins !

translation.en: So you're the Monkey King. Gonna party at your banquets.
translation.fr: - Le fameux le Roi singe. - On va se goinfrer à tes banquets.

translation.en: -Get hammered. -Release form!
-We're gonna share battle stories. -Please. You're not one of us.
translation.fr: - Partager nos anecdotes. - Tu n'as pas ta place ici.

translation.en: Actually, I am. Crossed my name out and everything.
translation.fr: Si, si, j'ai rayé mon nom du parchemin.

translation.en: That only makes you half-immortal.
-Half? -You can't die of old age.
translation.fr: Tu ne mourras pas de vieillesse.

translation.en: Oh, that's great!
But you can still die in battle.
Don't look at me. This was your plan.
translation.fr: Pas de reproches. C'était ton idée.

translation.en: Well, this is new information.
So, how exactly does one get full immortality?
You don't. Not possible.
Well, there is The Book of Everlasting Life, my lord.
translation.fr: Il y a bien le Livre de la Vie éternelle.

translation.en: -You shut your beard hole right now! -My bad.
-Stick, door! -[Stick murmurs]
Assistant, book! Monkey, stay handsome.
translation.fr: Assistante, le bouquin ! Singe, sois sexy.

translation.en: Whatever you do, don't let him leave with that book!
translation.fr: Empêche-le coûte que coûte de repartir avec !

translation.en: Let's go.
-[Yama grunts] -[Monkey King] Make way!
Catch him! Catch him!
No, no, no, no, no, no, no! Monkey!
Ha! Well, that was fun. You got the book?
-Uh, um, uh… -You didn't lose it, did you?
You had one job! One job and you blew it!
translation.fr: Tu as foiré ta seule mission !

translation.en: -Just messing with you! -Do you treat all your friends like this?
translation.fr: - Je te charrie. - Drôle de conception de l'amitié.

translation.en: Friends? Whoa, okay. You're more like a teammate on my very critical mission.
translation.fr: T'emballe pas, on est juste coéquipiers le temps de ma mission.

translation.en: Well, that's better than a pebble.
All right. Moving on. See this?
translation.fr: Bref. Ce livre contient le secret de mon immortalité totale.

translation.en: This book can tell us how I can get my full immortality.
translation.fr: Ce livre contient le secret de mon immortalité totale.

translation.en: Okay. Uh, it says…
Oh. "Full immortality can be attained by eating a magical peach
translation.fr: "Une pêche du Verger enchanté de la Vie éternelle

translation.en: from the Enchanted Orchard of Everlasting Life."
translation.fr: "Une pêche du Verger enchanté de la Vie éternelle "offre l'immortalité totale."

translation.en: Ooh! Where's that?
This could take a while.
And I will give you five minutes.
This monkey's insane.
Oh really?
He gets in fights, insults the gods.
He just stole a book from hell! Oh yeah, did I mention? We went to hell!
translation.fr: Il a volé un livre aux Enfers ! Aux Enfers, enfin !

translation.en: Okay, let's bring the sass down to, like, a four, okay, sweetheart?
I can't keep this up. I can't do this. Listen, honey, we made a deal.
translation.fr: - J'arrête tout. - On a un accord, ma belle.

translation.en: There's no backing out now.
Or did you forget?
[sighs] I remember.
[Lin] I beseech you, divine dragon.
End our suffering.
Our crops are dying.
Could you please grace us with a rainstorm?
-[groans] We've been searching forever! -What?
Why aren't the "wanted" posters working? But we put them up everywhere, Your Grace. There's one.
translation.fr: - Les avis de recherche ne donnent rien. - Il y en a partout. Regardez.

translation.en: What is this?
I told you to draw the monkey, you dimwit!
translation.fr: Il fallait dessiner le singe, crétins !

translation.en: But, sire, monkeys are so much harder to draw than sticks.
translation.fr: C'est tellement plus dur à dessiner.

translation.en: -No, wait, wait! -[yells] What the--
[gasps] Divine Master of Weather. Thank you for answering my call.
translation.fr: Maître de la Météo, merci pour votre présence.

translation.en: How dare you, a mere mortal, speak to his lordship.
translation.fr: Comment oses-tu t'adresser à son Altesse ?

translation.en: -Avert your eyes. -[Lin] My apologies.
We have no food here. No water. Could you please, please send us rain?
translation.fr: La sécheresse sévit. Pitié, envoyez de la pluie.

translation.en: Well, aren't you a presumptuous little snack.
Wait, please!
I'll do anything. You must need something. An assistant. A servant.
translation.fr: Je ferai n'importe quoi. Je pourrais vous servir.

translation.en: A human servant? Ha!
He already has two perfectly good and trusted advisors. We carry his tub.
translation.fr: - Deux fidèles conseillers suffisent. - On porte sa baignoire.

translation.en: [laughs] No! No. But perhaps our monkey would.
translation.fr: Non, mais tu serais utile à notre singe.

translation.en: Monkey?
Would you lie for me? Get your paws dirty?
translation.fr: Mentirais-tu pour moi ? Te salirais-tu les pattes ?

translation.en: You'll have to be manipulative, vicious, and cunning.
Do you have that in you, you scrumptious, sweet little thing?
translation.fr: En es-tu capable, délicieuse petite chose ?

translation.en: Because when you make a deal with me, you follow through or…
translation.fr: Car une fois l'accord passé, mieux vaut t'exécuter ou…

translation.en: It's chapped lips for you! [laughs]
Benbo, he eats her.
Oh! Yeah, that too. [laughs]
Okay. I accept.
Befriend a certain monkey, earn his trust, and take his stick.
translation.fr: Rapproche-toi du singe, gagne sa confiance et dérobe son bâton.

translation.en: When it's in my possession,
you'll get your rain.
He never lets the stick out of his sight.
translation.fr: Il le lâche jamais des yeux.

translation.en: The sooner it's in my grip, the faster you'll get your drip, drip, drip.
translation.fr: Plus vite tu l'obtiendras, plus vite il pleuvra.

translation.en: Well, now he's got me searching this stolen book for some Orchard of Everlasting Life.
translation.fr: Maintenant, il veut que je trouve son Verger de la Vie éternelle.

translation.en: He's still trying to join the Immortal Ones? [laughs]
translation.fr: Il a toujours pas lâché l'affaire ?

translation.en: What a fool.
What should I do?
Hm. He wants an enchanted peach now, does he?
translation.fr: Alors comme ça, il veut une pêche enchantée ?

translation.en: Oh, well, I'll just have to put on a little show and give him one. [laughs]
translation.fr: Je vais lui en donner une, moi.

translation.en: All you need to worry about is getting him there.
You sure this is the right way to get to that fancy peach orchard?
translation.fr: Tu es sûre qu'on va dans la bonne direction ?

translation.en: Yeah, definitely.
-[Monkey King grunts] Woo-hoo! -[Lin] Do you have to go top speed?
This? Ha! Please.
-I'll show you top speed. -No, no, no. I--
Now, any personal assistant of mine really needs to be in the moment.
translation.fr: J'aime que mon assistante soit réactive.

translation.en: You need to be more focused and pay better attention.
I need to know you'll always have my back.
translation.fr: Je dois pouvoir compter sur toi.

translation.en: Monkey!
He's coming back. He's coming back.
[Monkey King] And my shoes perfectly shined.
He's not coming back!
It's the attention to detail that I value most.
translation.fr: Ton sens du détail doit être irréprochable.

translation.en: Where to next? The hills? The desert?
translation.fr: Quelle direction ? Les collines ou le désert ?

translation.en: Aw, man!
Trees.
So many trees.
I could've died peacefully in my village, but, no!
translation.fr: Dans quel bourbier me suis-je fourrée ?

translation.en: Chamber of Ridiculous Deaths, here I come.
translation.fr: Chambre des Morts ridicules, me voilà.

translation.en: ♪ Who's the handsome hero We love and adore? ♪
translation.fr: Qui est ce beau héros Encensé, acclamé ?

translation.en: ♪ Monkey King! ♪
Man, that's really catchy.
Help!
-Where is she? -[Lin screams]
Oh, there you are. Did you hear any of my performance evaluation?
translation.fr: Te voilà. Tu as écouté mon feedback ?

translation.en: -[Stick murmurs] -You are crazy!
And handsome.
If you're gonna be critical, be fair.
translation.fr: Aie la critique juste, au moins.

translation.en: Places, everyone. Places!
Almost showtime.
Buzz for me, Babbo. Buzz!
[groans] Must I, sire?
Come on. Sell it.
Look at my little stinger!
-I'm adorable! -All right, Benbo, less is more.
translation.fr: Je suis à croquer ! Tu en fais trop.

translation.en: He's never gonna buy this. Does this look like an enchanted peach garden?
translation.fr: Il ne va jamais croire que c'est un verger enchanté.

translation.en: If you believe it, so will your audience. Here are the new sides.
Try not to step on each other's lines. Keep the scene contained.
translation.fr: Ne vous coupez pas. Ne divaguez pas.

translation.en: I only had time to poison one tree.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pu empoisonner qu'un seul arbre.

translation.en: The toxin should take only a few moments to knock him out cold.
Remember, the tree in the light has the peach he should bite.
translation.fr: La pêche à croquer est sur l'arbre éclairé.

translation.en: If it's hidden by night, then the fruit isn't right. Got it?
translation.fr: Si dissimulé par la nuit, évitez ce fruit. OK ?

translation.en: Okay. If the tree is in light, then, um, uh…
-It's the peach he should bite. -Oh yeah. So definitely not that tree.
translation.fr: - … est sur l'arbre éclairé. - Donc pas cet arbre.

translation.en: Yes, exactly that tree.
But that tree's not white. It's more of a brown.
translation.fr: Mais il est marron, pas clair.

translation.en: No, not the color!
translation.fr: Je parle pas de la couleur !

translation.en: I lit it up for you. See?
Still nothing?
So, it's a glowing tree?
translation.fr: Vous faisiez référence à la lumière ?

translation.en: Exactly. Wow.
And once the monkey passes out, I'll grab the stick and--
translation.fr: Quand le singe s'effondrera, je m'emparerai du bâton.

translation.en: Oh, here they come.
Everybody back to one. Hit your marks. And let's have some fun out there.
translation.fr: On reprend. À vos places. Et faites-vous plaisir.

translation.en: This one? No. That one.
Ugh. This peach grove looks kinda shabby. Are you sure this is--
translation.fr: Il a une drôle de tête, ce verger. Tu es sûre de…

translation.en: Oh yeah. One bite of the magical fruit, and you get full immortality.
translation.fr: Oui. Une bouchée du fruit, et à toi l'immortalité.

translation.en: ♪ Behold this magic garden ♪
♪ Full of magic nature ♪
♪ It's the Orchard of Everlasting Life ♪
translation.fr: C'est le Verger de la Vie éternelle

translation.en: ♪ We are the magic guardians ♪
translation.fr: Nous sommes les protecteurs Et pollinisateurs

translation.en: ♪ And the pollinators Of this magic orchard ♪
translation.fr: Nous sommes les protecteurs Et pollinisateurs De ce verger très, très magique

translation.en: ♪ Which is definitely real ♪
translation.fr: De ce verger très, très magique

translation.en: I don't know why,
but I like these guys.
Oh yeah, totally.
♪ Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha! Handsome, hairy stranger ♪
♪ We are the protectors ♪
♪ Of the nectar of immortality ♪
♪ We promise there's no danger ♪
♪ So eat a poison peach ♪
translation.fr: Prends une pêche empoiso… Juteuse à souhait

translation.en: ♪ I mean, the peaches that are juiciest Are in that glowing tree ♪
translation.fr: Prends une pêche empoiso… Juteuse à souhait Dans cet arbre illuminé

translation.en: ♪ Hopefully ♪
Stand back.
I'm not feeling anything special.
Hey, do I look immortal?
-Hm, well-- -Or maybe it's the tree over here.
That's ridiculous. The one in the light has the juiciest--
Stick to the pages!
Maybe it's this tree. The one in the dark. That's the most delicious.
translation.fr: C'est peut-être celui dans l'ombre. Oui, c'est lui.

translation.en: Hold it. Let me check.
Nope. Definitely not as juicy as the one--
The tree in the dark…
Uh, what's wrong with this one?
…has the tastiest bark. [laughs]
That seems suspicious.
No, no, no, no. This is definitely the right tree.
-Eat it. -No, you eat it.
-No, you eat it. -No improv.
translation.fr: - Mange. - Non, toi, mange. Pas d'impro.

translation.en: -You eat it first. -You eat it.
-[Monkey King] You eat it. -Come on. Just eat it. Yum.
translation.fr: - Toi d'abord. - Non, toi. Allez, mange.

translation.en: How about at the same time?
Fine. Immortality, here I come.
I don't feel anything. What?
Oh, wait. Maybe I do.
I feel good!
Me too!
Maybe you should just sit down.
Hey! Buzz off, lady, and mind your own…

Oh, your skin's all cleared up. You are gorgy!

You idiot!
Don't you realize what's in those

Oh man!
I loved those guys!
[groans] Those… Those are good people.

The three of us, we're family.

Dra… Uh, Dragon?
Monkey?
You awake?
-Agh! -Wait!
Did the peaches work? Am I fully immortal now?

Take my stick and whack me in the face. It's all right. Come on, come on. Do it.

-[groans] Fine. I'll do it myself, wuss. -[Lin snarls]

translation.en: -[groans] -You're still half-immortal.
I don't do half-things.
Yeah, I noticed.
This old geezer once told me all the things I couldn't do.
translation.fr: À l'époque, je me faisais rabaisser par ce vieux débris

translation.en: That I'd wind up alone.
Yeah. "You'll never amount to anything."
I heard that all the time back home. [sighs]
Wish I could relate.
Well, thanks for your help. -I mean, it was mostly me. -You're leaving?
translation.fr: - Merci pour ton aide. Ou pas. - Tu pars ?

translation.en: -It was nice knowing you, little girl. -But no!
[grunts] Don't go. You said we were family.
-No, I didn't. -You did. Doesn't sound like me.
-Well, you said it. -That was just the peaches talking.
translation.fr: - Tu l'as dit. - À cause de la pêche.

translation.en: But you promised we'd do big things. We can't give up now.

translation.en: "We"? Who's this "we"?
I'm still gonna join the Immortal Ones. -Just not with you. -[Lin groans]

translation.en: You know what? I'm starting to think that wasn't even the real peach orchard.

translation.en: What? [laughs awkwardly]
You think I… I deliberately brought you to the wrong place?
L-L-Like some sort of… Like some sort of trap?
translation.fr: De t'avoir attiré dans un piège ?

I'm not not saying it.
You know what? Go ahead. Walk away. You're so selfish.

translation.en: You only care about yourself.
-Well, no one else will. -Ugh! 'Cause you won't let them.
translation.fr: - Personne ne m'aime. - Parce que tu les repousses.

translation.en: Someday, you really will end up all alone.
translation.fr: Tu finiras vraiment tes jours seul.

translation.en: -What are you yapping on about? -[Stick murmurs]
Who's that? Assistant, what does it say?
"An authority on everlasting life, the royal sorceress, Wangmu,
translation.fr: "Wangmu, experte en vie éternelle et magicienne impériale,

translation.en: can often be found in her laboratory brewing her famous Elixir of Immortality."
translation.fr: "Wangmu, experte en vie éternelle et magicienne impériale, "prépare son Élixir d'Immortalité dans son laboratoire."

translation.en: Way to go, Stick! Mwah!
You too, Pebble. What are we waiting for?
-But that's in heaven. -Monkey King reigns supreme!
translation.fr: - C'est aux Cieux. - Le Roi singe règne en maître !

Absolutely.
-[Monkey King] Woo-hoo! -What the--
[Lin] There she is. Wangmu.

Yeah, whatever. Let's go make me immortal.
Locked.
No. No, no, no! Monkey!
Somewhere in this room are the ingredients for making the Elixir of Immortality.

translation.en: -Guess I'll just have to taste everything. -No. No. Wait.

translation.en: -First thing we need is-- -Here goes nothing.
Hey, don't drink that.
-I'm just smelling it. -[Lin] Don't smell anything.

translation.en: -[Monkey King screeches] -[Lin yelps]
[grunts] Okay, Lin. You got this.
Don't look back. Don't look back. Don't… look… back.
Aw, you're just a scared little monkey.

You are alone.
Sorry, Monkey.
I can't fool around anymore.
My people are counting on me.
-Oh! Agh! -Gee, why'd you trash this place?

translation.en: -We're guests here. -[Lin groans]

translation.en: Hello? Come on. I'm not paying you to goof around.

translation.en: -We're not actually paying her, are we? -[Stick hums]
Right. The first ingredient is…
There. A pinch of instant karma.
-Get mixing. -[woman] Stealing from an old lady?

First, I punish you.
Then I shame you.
You can't shame me.
I have no shame.
And you have no exit.

Eat lightning, chimp! [laughs]
Immortality Elixir! Let's go!
A spoonful of chi. There! The blue jar.

-[Monkey King] What's next? -A drop of moon essence. The green jar.

translation.fr: - Le bocal vert. - Vilain singe ! OK.

Yes!
-That's it. -[Monkey] What else?

-Perfect. -[Monkey King] Ha ha!

-Taste this. [grunts] -Right.

His what?

Ha ha! Stick, where are you?
-Whoa! -Back for more, Monkey?

-[Wangmu laughs] -No, not this time.
Goodbye, mortal.
Half-mortal.
You couldn't possibly think you were worthy to take your place here

That was fun.
-Monkey! -Agh!
What?

And huge!
I'm one of you now.

I summon the Immortal Ones!

Monkey King!

He's not coming!
You came back for me.

Fully immortal!
So don't let anyone,
god, demon, old monkeys,
challenge you or stand in your way.

don't ask.

I dunno.
Two, three
years! [inhales deeply]

Stickipoo here had a momentary fling,
but now he's come home.

And a warm thanks to you for the help, my child.

For you, your people, and the entire world!

This monkey heroes alone!

I believe I said invite only!

translation.en: What do we do now?
I am the mighty Dragon King,

Monkey punching-bag!

Knock it off!
Monkey!
[Dragon King grunts] Stop!
-[Lin] I got ya. Head for high ground! -[child] Mama!

Stop wrecking my clones!
-Monkey! You're not alone. I can help you! -[Monkey King snarls]

-[dramatic music plays] -Why won't you die?

Lightning. It's the only thing that can defeat him.

I'm his.

Monkey?

Monkey!

Monkey King is my old title.
You will address me as the Great Sage,
equal of heaven!
How can we show him he's not the center of the universe?
translation.fr: Comment lui montrer qu'il n'est pas le centre de l'univers ?

translation.en: I got it! [deep voice] I have a challenge for you, Great Sage.
translation.fr: Je sais ! J'ai un défi à te proposer, Grand Sage.

translation.en: Not interested!
-What is it? -[Lin as Buddha] Something worthy of you.
translation.fr: J'écoute. Un défi à ta hauteur.

translation.en: The ultimate challenge.
What gives?
[Lin as Buddha] If you are powerful enough to leap from my palm,
translation.fr: Si tu parviens à sortir de ma paume de main,

translation.en: the kingdom of heaven will be yours to rule.
translation.fr: le royaume des Cieux sera tien.

translation.en: Hang on. What did he just say?
[deep voice] But if you fail, you will do a long penance here on Earth.
translation.fr: Mais si tu échoues, tu purgeras une longue pénitence sur Terre.

translation.en: Please. Too easy! [laughs]
I just have to leave your hand?
You're on, but you're gonna feel pretty foolish in about two sec…
translation.fr: OK, mais je te préviens, tu vas le regretter dans…

translation.en: Cloud jump!
-[cat yelps] -I really hate that monkey.
This is the edge of the universe, Stick!
translation.fr: C'est la limite de l'univers, Bâton !

translation.en: -[Stick squeals] -[Monkey King] I rule!
Yeah, I totally should. Just to prove I was here.
translation.fr: T'as raison. Une preuve de mon passage.

translation.en: Ha ha! And now to make my other mark.
-[Monkey King sighs] -[Lin as Buddha] Stop that, Monkey.
Uh, the Great Sage.
[Lin as Buddha] You never left my hand, Monkey King.
translation.fr: - Tu n'as jamais quitté ma main. - Quoi ?

translation.en: Wait a second. No! No. No, no, no, no, no! No! No!
Whatever just happened, that's cheating! Do-over!
translation.fr: C'est de la triche ! On refait !

translation.en: Hard pass.
-Pebble? -[Lin laughs]
translation.fr: - Petit Caillou ? - Tu as le droit d'être ici ?

translation.en: -Are you even supposed to be in there? -Absolutely not. Isn't it great?
translation.fr: - Petit Caillou ? - Tu as le droit d'être ici ? Bien sûr que non. J'adore.

translation.en: You tricked me! Not fair! That's two against one.
translation.fr: Tu m'as berné ! Deux contre un, c'est injuste.

translation.en: I'm sorry. This is the only way to help you.
translation.fr: Tu ne m'as pas laissé le choix.

translation.en: No! Stick!
Well, guess what?
[grunts] This is so exactly what I wanted to happen.
translation.fr: C'est exactement ce que je voulais.

translation.en: Told you, you'd feel foolish. Ha ha.
[Buddha] Monkey King,
you are now on the path of meditation and self-reflection.
translation.fr: il est temps pour toi de méditer et te remettre en question.

translation.en: I was born from a rock, you know?
This is where I thrive! Monkey King reigns supreme! [strains]
translation.fr: Ça me fait pas peur. Le Roi singe règne en maître !

translation.en: [Buddha] When you awake to nothingness,
you will have found your way.
Awake to nothingness.
Whatever that means.
I'll think about it.
He's just a little monkey looking for a place to belong.
translation.fr: C'est juste un petit singe qui cherche sa place.

translation.en: [Buddha] The Monkey King's scroll
is still to be written.
When he is ready,
the world will need him
translation.fr: le monde aura besoin de lui,

translation.en: as it has needed you.
translation.fr: comme il a eu besoin de toi.

translation.en: Hey, Lin, where's our hero going today?
I'll be back by sunset.
[Babbo] And two extra-large milk tea bobas.
Want honey with that? I made it myself.
translation.fr: Avec un peu de miel ? Fait maison.

translation.en: My gosh! How do I awaken to nothingness?
translation.fr: Comment je le trouve ce néant ?

translation.en: What does that even mean?
Be calm? Patient? Humble?
I'm the king of being humble!
translation.fr: Je suis le roi de l'humilité !

translation.en: [Lin] Monkey? Monkey.
Go away! I'm busy thinking of all the ways to get back at you.
translation.fr: Va-t'en ! La vengeance est un plat qui se mange froid.

translation.en: Calmly.
I came to say goodbye before Buddha closes up your mountain.
translation.fr: Je voulais te voir avant que la montagne ne soit scellée.

translation.en: Oh, lucky me.
I know you're mad, but you were out of control.
[groans] Okay, you don't have to remind me.
Taking on all the gods probably wasn't my best idea.
translation.fr: M'en prendre aux dieux n'était pas l'idée du siècle.

translation.en: I really messed up, didn't I?
Monkey, you were born from a rock,
translation.fr: Singe, tu es né d'un rocher,

translation.en: abandoned by everyone.
Th-The gods hated you,
and all you ever wanted was to be loved.
translation.fr: Tu cherchais juste à être aimé.

translation.en: [Lin] And you are!
You changed my life.
I made a difference. We both did.
translation.fr: J'ai changé les choses. Toi aussi.

translation.en: I really am your number one fan.
translation.fr: Je suis ta plus grande fan.

translation.en: Well, I guess a little pebble did make a big wave.
translation.fr: Un petit caillou peut être un atout, après tout.

translation.en: With an assist. Oh, that's good.
translation.fr: - Avec un coup de pouce. - Joli.

translation.en: Me, your assistant? Okay. Okay.
We helped each other.
Well, we didn't do it all alone.
Stick! Buddy! I missed you so much!
translation.fr: Bâton ! Mon pote ! Tu m'as tellement manqué.

translation.en: The team is back.
I guess this is goodbye.
Wait, don't go yet. [grunts]
Thank you for everything.
I'll miss you, Monkey.
Keep writing your scroll, Lin.
I will.
[Lin] I kept my promise and did great things.
translation.fr: J'ai tenu ma promesse et changé les choses.

translation.en: And Monkey, I'm sure he'll be out in no time.
translation.fr: Quant à Singe, il sera bientôt sorti.

translation.en: Monkey, demons run wild across the land.
translation.fr: Singe, les démons ont envahi nos terres.

translation.en: The Buddha sent us to release you.
translation.fr: Bouddha nous a envoyés pour te libérer.

translation.en: Are you ready to join our journey to the West?
translation.fr: Es-tu prêt à rejoindre notre pérégrination vers l'ouest ?

translation.en: I have awoken with peace in my heart,
translation.fr: Je me suis éveillé, la paix dans le cœur,

translation.en: and you wish for me to fight?
translation.fr: et tu désires m'envoyer au combat ?

translation.en: Well, yes, but--
Come on, Stick. The world needs us.
translation.fr: C'est parti, Bâton. Le monde a besoin de nous.
